title: Help, need new champions for middle
body: Hey, looking for new mid champion. I currently play diana, annie and anivia. I have fizz, ahri, ekko, yasuo, lux, ziggs, leblanc, akali, kat, veigar, orianna, malz, tf, kass, nid, zed, morg and brand. I'm into bursty champions, not really dps. Any suggestions?

replies.body: Azir - Twisted Fate - Anivia - Orianna. Are some of the higher skilled and strongest atm.
Play Lux. She's sort of amazing, and sniping people with her ult feels so good
Agree with this, really strong in this meta.

You should try out Galio or swain.. like nobody plays them at all but they are both really strong! sure Galio use's a tonn of mana and swain is not that great pre 6 but swain has massive burst potential if you get your q on them to slow and your then your w to keep the q on them and do large damage and if you hit your e before that then it does 20% extra magic damage from all your spells .. and well if things turn around on you   just pop your ult and take all the health from everything around you for as long as your mana holds up :) and Galio's q does huge early game damage and is a slow his e can be a great initiation or escape tool and his w in late game ... is like.. you put that onto yourself while walking past a minion wave and all your HP is restored in seconds .. Trust no one knows how to play against them .. so they work out pretty well.
na play support. nobody plays support. everyone knows only the most toxic of 12 year olds "main" mid lane and arent even silver on oce
Or, idk, learn the art of fill.

Yasuo is less burst and relies on catching the enemy off guard more than anything (then ult, auto attack auto attack, dead, gg, whatever)
Lux is a sniper at heart and is amazing at dealing damage from a distance.

For burst, definitely go Veigar and Zed. Brand is great if you don't care how fast it takes for your damage to come while not being sustained damage, Orianna if you love positioning, or Malzahar if you're interested in what Brand has, and your definition of burst is more of "Single combo to get rid of enemy's HP" rather than "Deal a ton of damage in a short amount of time", he has a lot of DoT but when you mix in your ult his combo is really good for killing an enemy.

Note to everyone: Burst is different from poke. Most poke champions have a sub-optimal all in combo that's a bit bursty but I think the poster is looking for a champ that mainly bursts. LB is the queen of burst, if you're looking for pure burst with nothing attached.
Yasuo, if you have the mechanics to use him well
Janna has the best burst in the game. Get on it asap dude.
